item.title: Amazon is selling a waterproof Casio sport watch for just $49 right now
item.description: This iconic piece of the 1980s can follow you on all your adventures.

item.title: Apple makes controversial move amid ongoing ICE raids
item.description: Apple makes a controversial step at the request of government authorities as ICE raids continue nationwide.

item.title: Las Vegas Strip casino closes legendary hard rock band residency
item.description: The popular hard rock band wraps up its first Las Vegas Strip residency since 2013.
